name: Master Sorcerer Spellcasting
prereq: Expert Sorcerer Spellcasting; Legendary In Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Or Religion, Depending On Bloodline
summary: You gain the master spellcasting benefits for sorcerer spellcasting.
description:
You gain the master spellcasting benefits.Traits
